chapters.title: Chapter 19: Memories
chapters.info: Lady Elenia Sarand, p. 347 (247)—Shrewish, honey-haired wife of Jarid. She is the High Seat of House Sarand in Andor. During the Succession, her House opposed Morgase; she was only allowed into the Palace for State occasions until Gaebril Compelled Morgase to rescind the exile. See also Sarand, Jarid.
